attributes.action: In light of the volume of Polish immigrants entering the UK, we the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to make Polish the national Language of Great Britain by 2011.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At current immigration rates, Polish will be the most common 1st Language in many cities within a few years, so lets make it official.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
